name: store_memory
description: Store important information about the user or project for future conversations. Use user_memory for preferences and facts that apply across all projects. Use project_memory for information specific to this project.

user_memory.description: Information about the user that should persist across all projects. Examples: name, preferences, expertise level, communication style preferences.

project_memory.description: Information specific to this project. Examples: project goals, key decisions made, important context about the topic.

why_generated.description: Brief explanation of why this information is being stored. Helps with memory organization.
